title: Drawing, Design for Serving Table with Straight Reeded Legs, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Serving Table with Straight Reeded Legs
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper left quadrant: a=, across left edge and at upper center of image, numerical notations indicating dimensions
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Oblong top with convex front; raised on 4 straight legs; reeded front legs terminate in balls, which are decorated at tops with short carved baluster-like elements; 2 rectangular shelves attach below, the lower one just above floor level; backsplash.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Serving Table with Straight Reeded Legs, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-86
